_header: O stern so bright that gives light
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — four six-line stanzas plus burden, written as introductory and concluding couplet: ‘O farest last o swetast lady / O blissful lady hewynus quheyne’

EDULaiii149.First Lines:
O streym so brycht þat gyfys lychttil hewyne & haly
                    kyrk…
EDULaiii149.Last Lines:
…In place quhare grace ay growit grenefor euer In ioy þa[
                    ] conteyne
